sentences: This item (FCCC/SB/2014/INF.1) was first considered by the SBSTA on 4 June.
The SBI and SBSTA Chairs convened a joint contact group on this item.
These discussions are summarized on page 10.
Matters Relating to Article 2.3 (Response Measures) of the Kyoto Protocol: This item was first considered by the SBSTA on 4 June.
The SBI and SBSTA considered this item under the Forum and Work Programme.
Informal consultations were convened by the SBSTA and SBI Chairs.
These discussions are summarized on page 10.
